how do i get this to quit coming here :$: which IRC client are you using?

go to the Network List, click "Ubuntu Servers", click Edit. To stop it from joining Ubuntu on startup, remove #ubuntu from your favorite channels list. To stop it from connecting to freenode, uncheck "Autoconnect to this network on startup"
No problem. By the way, if you're using xchat-gnome, you may want to check out the xchat package. Many people prefer it :)
